  * [ #graphics ](https://crates.io/keywords/graphics)
  * [ #svg ](https://crates.io/keywords/svg)

over 2 years ago

cargo add lyon
Or add the following line to your Cargo.toml:
lyon = "1.0.1"

# Lyon
A path tessellation library written in rust for GPU-based 2D graphics rendering.
![Project logo](https://img.gs/czjpqfbdkz/full/https://nical.github.io/lyon-doc/lyon-logo.svg)
[ ![crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/lyon.svg) ](https://crates.io/crates/lyon) [ ![Build Status](https://img.gs/czjpqfbdkz/full/https://github.com/nical/lyon/actions/workflows/main.yml/badge.svg) ](https://github.com/nical/lyon/actions) [ ![documentation](https://img.gs/czjpqfbdkz/full/https://docs.rs/lyon/badge.svg) ](https://docs.rs/lyon) [ ![Gitter Chat](https://img.shields.io/badge/GITTER-join%20chat-green.svg) ](https://gitter.im/lyon-rs/Lobby)
## Example
```
``extern` `crate` lyon`;`
`use` `lyon`::```math`::``point`;`
`use` `lyon`::```path`::``Path`;`
`use` `lyon`::```tessellation`::```*``;`
``fn` `main`````(````)``````{`
  ``//` Build a Path.`
  `let` `mut` builder `=` `Path`::``builder`(``)``;`
  builder`.``begin``(``point``(``0.``0``,` `0.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``line_to``(``point``(``1.``0``,` `0.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``quadratic_bezier_to``(``point``(``2.``0``,` `0.``0``)``,` `point``(``2.``0``,` `1.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``cubic_bezier_to``(``point``(``1.``0``,` `1.``0``)``,` `point``(``0.``0``,` `1.``0``)``,` `point``(``0.``0``,` `0.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``end``(``true``)``;`
  `let` path `=` builder`.``build``(``)``;`
  ``//` Let's use our own custom vertex type instead of the default one.`
  ``#``[``derive```(```Copy`,` Clone`,` Debug```)```]``
  ``struct` ```MyVertex` ```{` `position``:` [`f32`; 2] `}```;`
  ``//` Will contain the result of the tessellation.`
  `let` `mut` geometry`:` `VertexBuffers`<`MyVertex, `u16``>`` `=` `VertexBuffers`::``new`(``)``;`
  `let` `mut` tessellator `=` `FillTessellator`::``new`(``)``;`
  `{`
    ``//` Compute the tessellation.`
    tessellator`.``tessellate_path``(`
      `&`path`,`
      `&``FillOptions`::``default`(``)``,`
      `&``mut` `BuffersBuilder`::``new`(``&``mut` geometry`,` ```|``````vertex``:` FillVertex`|`` ```{`
        MyVertex `{`
          position`:` vertex`.``position``(``)``.``to_array``(``)``,`
        `}`
      `}```)``,`
    `)``.``unwrap``(``)``;`
  `}`
  ``//` The tessellated geometry is ready to be uploaded to the GPU.`
  `println!``(```"` -- `{}` vertices `{}` indices`"```,`
    geometry`.`vertices`.``len``(``)``,`
    geometry`.`indices`.``len``(``)`
  `)``;`
```}```
`
```

#### Dependencies
~2MB  ~43K SLoC
  * [lyon_algorithms](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon_algorithms "new") 1.0
  * [extra?](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon/features#feature-extra "optional feature") [lyon_extra](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon_extra "1.0.0")
  * [lyon_tessellation](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon_tessellation "new") 1.0


#### [Other features](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon/features)
  * [debugger](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon/features#feature-debugger)
  * [profiling](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon/features#feature-profiling)
  * [serialization](https://lib.rs/crates/lyon/features#feature-serialization)


  *[SLoC]: approx. additional lines of code

# Lyon
A path tessellation library written in rust for GPU-based 2D graphics rendering.
![Project logo⟨4⟩]
 ![crates.io⟨5⟩ ](https://crates.io/crates/lyon)  ![Build Status⟨6⟩ ](https://github.com/nical/lyon/actions)  ![documentation⟨7⟩ ](https://docs.rs/lyon)  ![Gitter Chat⟨8⟩ ](https://gitter.im/lyon-rs/Lobby)
## Example
```
``extern` `crate` lyon`;`
`use` `lyon`::```math`::``point`;`
`use` `lyon`::```path`::``Path`;`
`use` `lyon`::```tessellation`::```*``;`
``fn` `main`````(````)``````{`
  ``//` Build a Path.`
  `let` `mut` builder `=` `Path`::``builder`(``)``;`
  builder`.``begin``(``point``(``0.``0``,` `0.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``line_to``(``point``(``1.``0``,` `0.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``quadratic_bezier_to``(``point``(``2.``0``,` `0.``0``)``,` `point``(``2.``0``,` `1.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``cubic_bezier_to``(``point``(``1.``0``,` `1.``0``)``,` `point``(``0.``0``,` `1.``0``)``,` `point``(``0.``0``,` `0.``0``)``)``;`
  builder`.``end``(``true``)``;`
  `let` path `=` builder`.``build``(``)``;`
  ``//` Let's use our own custom vertex type instead of the default one.`
  ``#``[``derive```(```Copy`,` Clone`,` Debug```)```]``
  ``struct` ```MyVertex` ```{` `position``:` [`f32`; 2] `}```;`
  ``//` Will contain the result of the tessellation.`
  `let` `mut` geometry`:` `VertexBuffers`<`MyVertex, `u16``>`` `=` `VertexBuffers`::``new`(``)``;`
  `let` `mut` tessellator `=` `FillTessellator`::``new`(``)``;`
  `{`
    ``//` Compute the tessellation.`
    tessellator`.``tessellate_path``(`
      `&`path`,`
      `&``FillOptions`::``default`(``)``,`
      `&``mut` `BuffersBuilder`::``new`(``&``mut` geometry`,` ```|``````vertex``:` FillVertex`|`` ```{`
        MyVertex `{`
          position`:` vertex`.``position``(``)``.``to_array``(``)``,`
        `}`
      `}```)``,`
    `)``.``unwrap``(``)``;`
  `}`
  ``//` The tessellated geometry is ready to be uploaded to the GPU.`
  `println!``(```"` -- `{}` vertices `{}` indices`"```,`
    geometry`.`vertices`.``len``(``)``,`
    geometry`.`indices`.``len``(``)`
  `)``;`
```}```
`
```

#### Dependencies
~2MB  ~43K SLoC
  * lyon_algorithms⟨9⟩ 1.0
  * extra?⟨10⟩ lyon_extra⟨11⟩
  * lyon_tessellation⟨12⟩ 1.0


#### Other features⟨13⟩
  * debugger⟨14⟩
  * profiling⟨15⟩
  * serialization⟨16⟩

enriched_crate.readme_summary: The `lyon` crate is a GPU-focused 2D graphics rendering library in Rust, specializing in path tessellation for shapes like rectangles, circles, and arbitrary paths. It provides modular sub-crates for path building (`lyon_path`), tessellation (`lyon_tessellation`), geometric utilities (`lyon_geom`), and algorithms (`lyon_algorithms`). Users can customize tessellation options, integrate with various rendering backends, and leverage tools for debugging and testing via `lyon_extra`.
enriched_crate.factual_counterfactual:
### Pair 1: Tessellation Capabilities  
✅ **Factual:** The `lyon_tessellation` crate provides tessellation routines for common 2D shapes, such as rectangles, circles, and paths, allowing developers to generate GPU-ready vertex data.  
❌ **Counterfactual:** The `lyon_tessellation` crate includes built-in support for 3D shape tessellation, such as spheres and cubes, for GPU rendering.  

---

### Pair 2: Feature Flags  
✅ **Factual:** The `serialization` feature flag in the `lyon` crate enables support for serializing path data using Serde, but it is disabled by default.  
❌ **Counterfactual:** The `serialization` feature flag in the `lyon` crate is enabled by default and automatically serializes all path data into JSON format.  

---

### Pair 3: Rendering and SVG Support  
✅ **Factual:** The `lyon` crate includes examples demonstrating how to render a subset of SVGs using GPU-based tessellation techniques, such as in the `wgpu_svg` example.  
❌ **Counterfactual:** The `lyon` crate provides full support for rendering all SVG features, including advanced filters and animations, out of the box.
